radiographic_examinations.findings: Decreased perfusion in the left frontal temporal lobe region.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat SPECT brain images showed a normal pattern of activity.

radiographic_examinations.findings: 27% decrease in flow rate due to stenosis in the region of the left carotid bifurcation.
Significant improvement, with some normalization of relative perfusion to both hemispheres.
